EmailTemplate.name: Wave 5- POSaaS - Defer 30 days
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Restaurant Solutions: Response to your billing request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Business_Continuity__c.Contact_Name__c},
NCR is here to help your business during this time of uncertainty.
Based on your request, as a way to help your business through the coronavirus pandemic, NCR will implement the following billing changes [if applicable] to your monthly POSaaS, Cloud Solutions and Aloha Essentials subscription fees.
· NCR will waive the service fees for the March billing period
· NCR will also delay collection of February services fees until May 2, 2020
What this means is that your ACH account/credit card will not be drafted/charged in April for services provided in February.
For further clarity, please refer to the table below on how these changes will be implemented
In an effort to provide relief quickly, you do not need to respond to this email to accept this offer.
If you have any questions, please reach out to your account manager, who is copied on this email
NCR is here to support your restaurant’s success. Thank you for your continued business.
NCR Hospitality Team
Note: This offer does not extend beyond the terms in this email and does not apply to past payments received or other amounts due from you to NCR. This offer is subject to the terms and conditions of your agreement with NCR, and your agreement with NCR remains unchanged except as set forth in this email. This offer does not apply to any royalty or transaction-based fees. This offer is non-transferrable and is void where prohibited
